hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: CloneType
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description:
linked: A linked clone is a copy of a virtual machine that shares virtual disks with the parent virtual machine in an ongoing manner. Ongoing changes to the virtual disk of the parent do not affect the linked clone, and changes to the disk of the linked clone do not affect the parent.
full: A full clone is a complete and independent copy of a virtual machine. It shares nothing with the parent virtual machine after the cloning operation. Ongoing operation of a full clone is entirely separate from the parent virtual machine.

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
::@ECHO off echo --------------------------------------- echo Shudown source VM echo --------------------------------------- cd "C:\Program Files (x86)\VMware\VMware Workstation" "vmrun.exe" -T ws stop "E:\Virtual Machines\%ImageBaseName%\%ImageBaseName%.vmx" soft ::IF NOT "%ERRORLEVEL%" EQU "0" GOTO ERROR
echo --------------------------------------- echo Clonning VM echo --------------------------------------- "vmrun.exe" -T ws clone "E:\Virtual Machines\%ImageBaseName%\%ImageBaseName%.vmx" "E:\Virtual Machines\%TargetMachineName%\%TargetMachineName%.vmx" %CloneType% "Snapshot for SCM-SIM-V32" -cloneName="%TargetMachineName% %CloneType% clone of %ImageBaseName%" IF NOT "%ERRORLEVEL%" EQU "0" GOTO ERROR
echo --------------------------------------- echo Starting cloned VM echo --------------------------------------- start /b "vmware.exe" -x "E:\Virtual Machines\%TargetMachineName%\%TargetMachineName%.vmx" IF NOT "%ERRORLEVEL%" EQU "0" GOTO ERROR
echo --------------------------------------- echo Sleep waiting machine to get up echo --------------------------------------- PING localhost -n 150 >NUL IF NOT "%ERRORLEVEL%" EQU "0" GOTO ERROR
echo --------------------------------------- echo Creating And Copy MachineName file echo --------------------------------------- echo %TargetMachineName%> "E:\Virtual Machines\%TargetMachineName%\COMPUTERNAME.txt" IF NOT "%ERRORLEVEL%" EQU "0" GOTO ERROR "vmrun.exe" -T ws -gu autologonuser -gp Columbia03 copyFileFromHostToGuest "E:\Virtual Machines\%TargetMachineName%\%TargetMachineName%.vmx" "E:\Virtual Machines\%TargetMachineName%\COMPUTERNAME.txt" "C:\COMPUTERNAME.txt" IF NOT "%ERRORLEVEL%" EQU "0" GOTO ERROR echo --------------------------------------- echo Restarting cloned VM echo --------------------------------------- "vmrun.exe" -T ws stop "E:\Virtual Machines\%TargetMachineName%\%TargetMachineName%.vmx" soft IF NOT "%ERRORLEVEL%" EQU "0" GOTO ERROR
"vmrun.exe" -T ws start "E:\Virtual Machines\%TargetMachineName%\%TargetMachineName%.vmx" gui IF NOT "%ERRORLEVEL%" EQU "0" GOTO ERROR GOTO END
:ERROR ECHO SORRY WE HAD FAILED
:END ECHO Good job Adham, we are ok
